transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs to make some changes. Many people have been saying this because the Church does not accept some things. Like gay marriages and abortion. The Church has strong views on these topics, but they are old-fashioned in some ways.

If the Church changed its ideas a little, it would not lose followers. People are turning away from the Church because of its views on these issues. Some people do not agree with the Church on things like this.

For example, the Church is against abortion. If you support abortion, you will not be comfortable in a Church where it is considered wrong. The same is true for gay marriage. If you believe in it, you might not want to be in a Church that does not agree.

The Church does not allow women to be priests or priests to be married. This might not have stopped problems in the Church, but it could have helped. Maybe priests would have acted differently if they were allowed to be married or have a family.

The Church says its priests are married to God and devote their lives to the Church. But other people can have a job and a family life. There is no reason priests cannot have both.

I am not opposed to gay marriage. I think it is not wrong for two people of the same sex to get married. People are born gay. It is not a choice. They should not be held responsible for their sexual orientation. It is not right to say that a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex cannot.

I think it is not a choice. People are born straight or gay. It is not something they can change. I was born straight and I know people are born gay. They should not be blamed for their sexual orientation.

I do not think the federal government should be involved in this issue. It is not a matter of law. It is not a moral issue either. People should be free to be who they are. They should not be judged or punished for being gay.

The federal government should not interfere with people's personal lives. They should let people make their own choices. Being gay is not a bad thing. It is just a part of who they are.

In my opinion, the federal government has no right to tell people what to do. They should not try to control people's lives. Gays are people too. They deserve respect and freedom.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. 

There is no good reason not to. 

Some people think that gay couples could be bad for families. But this is not true. Every couple is different. 

Gay couples are like heterosexual couples. They have the same kinds of problems and the same kinds of love. 

Gay couples want a marriage certificate from the government, not a marriage in a church. This should not be a problem. 

It is like segregation. Separate and unequal is not fair. 

People are worried about adoption and how children will be treated. But this is not a reason to keep gay couples from marrying. 

Gay parents love their children just like straight parents do. They make the same decisions and have the same feelings. 

We should not judge people based on their choices. We should let them be who they are. 

The government should make sure gay marriage is allowed everywhere. The law should be fair for everyone. 

President Bush has his own opinions on this issue. He thinks it is against his religion. But the government should not make laws based on one person's opinions. 

We should consider what is fair and what is right. The government should not just follow what some people believe. 

Some people think gay people are damaged or have a personality problem. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so. We should listen to experts, not just what people think. 

We should treat everyone equally and with respect. This is what we want for our country.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. You may wonder why I think marijuana should be legal. The reason is simple – a drug being illegal does not mean it has no good effects. While I do not think it should be available to the public, I believe it can be useful for medical purposes.

Many medicines used in pharmacies are illegal, but they are still used because they are helpful. For example, oxycodone and Vicodin are controlled substances, but they are used because they are beneficial. Marijuana may have beneficial effects, but it is not available because of a negative image. I think we should look at the good things marijuana can do and understand it better.

Marijuana and alcohol are not the same. While abusing marijuana can be bad, abusing alcohol can also cause problems. But we can use marijuana responsibly. To do this, we need to change the way people think about marijuana. If we make it legal, people may use it wisely.

The problem is that many people think marijuana is bad because it is illegal. But it is not as bad as heroine or cocaine. If we can change this image, people may use marijuana responsibly for medical reasons.

I think the church has changed in recent years to become more like the 21st century. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was young, I went to church on Sundays. I would wear nice dresses, matching shoes, and a matching purse. I attended a private school and saw my friends there on weekends. We would attend the early mass. But now, the church has a special service for teenagers, called a teenager mass. The service is only 30 minutes long. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. Some wear beach clothes right from the beach. Families sometimes arrive late. The church has become more casual, even for morning masses. I used to wear nice clothes, but now people wear jeans and khakis. This is the main thing I have noticed about the church.

As for other things, that is all I know about the church. I do not know about the politics inside the church. I am not sure about the church's rules and decisions.

I do not think the church's rules about marriage and being a priest would have stopped the problems with pedophilia. There are men who are married but still have these problems. It is not because they are allowed to get married or not that causes the problem, but because of the person themselves. Becoming a priest is a choice, and there are other religions where priests can get married.

I think the problem of pedophilia is based on genetics. People are born with these tendencies, and it is not something they become because of how they are raised. Genetics play a role, and you cannot hide this through marriage. It may come out eventually. The church may not be able to prevent this from happening.

If the church knew about the problems and tried to cover them up, that would be wrong. But I do not think they knew in all cases. I do not have any other thoughts about the Catholic church.

I was unhappy with the reasons for the United States going to war in Iraq. 

The US went to war in Iraq after the September 11 attacks. However, I do not think that was the real reason for the war. The US government said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction, but this was not true. 

I think the Bush administration lied to the American people. Even Colin Powell, the former Secretary of State, said he was not sure about the evidence. 

The US government does not respect the Constitution. They are trying to ignore its rules. Since the September 11 attacks, the government has been doing this. 

The Bush administration wanted to go to war in Iraq before they took office. 

I think the US government has no respect for human life. They caused a lot of suffering in Iraq. 

The country is unstable. Iraqis are fighting among themselves. The government is not working well. The Prime Minister has no control over the country. Radical groups are fighting for power. I am worried about the future of Iraq.

I have some thoughts about the war in Iraq. It is not a declared war. It began after the attacks on the United States on nine eleven. I do not like to follow the details of the war. It seems like we are in Iraq to help build a democracy. But it is also about getting oil from the country.

Staying in Iraq makes people upset. If we leave, they will be angry with us. We will have to help them rebuild their country. But if we stay, it will take a long time to build a democracy. It is not fair to the people of Iraq.

I do not know what to say. This is a difficult topic. I think the war should end, but I also think about the families of soldiers who are fighting in Iraq. They have lives, just like us. We have hurt their country and their people.

It is hard to decide what to do. If we stay, we will try to change their way of life. But their culture is different from ours. It may make things worse for them. Their feelings of hate towards the United States may grow.

I think this war will last a long time. It will be a big problem for years to come.

I don't agree with this idea. It's not right for the government to make something legal or illegal. The constitution says the government and the church should be separate. This is clear in the constitution. It's a basic rule. The government should not try to enforce its power over it.

Trying to make laws against it is wrong. It would be against the constitution. The constitution says the government should not choose which churches are good or bad. Most Catholics and Christians do not agree with it. But this should not be a decision for the government to make.

Separation of church and state is a key part of the United States. It allows for freedom of religion. The government should not make laws about what churches can or cannot do. Even if there was a new law, it would be wrong. It would go against what is already written.

The government should not be involved in this issue. I don't see why the president is pushing for this law. It's because of his own personal feelings. He wants to show that one church is better than others. This is not fair.

It's up to the churches to decide what is right or wrong. The president and the government should not make this decision. There is no good reason for this law. It's just because of personal views.

This law might not be good for the economy. It could even help the economy. I'm not sure. But I think it could make society better.

I think I said everything I wanted to say.

The war in Iraq was a big problem. The American government did not tell the truth to the American people about why they wanted to go to war. They said that the war was connected to the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001. But, really, it was not. 

Going to war in Iraq was a mistake. I do not think war is usually a good idea. The government made it seem like the war would be short and successful. But, it was not. Many American soldiers died. 

This war was like the Vietnam War. The American government made the same mistake twice. They took out the Iraqi government and thought everything would be okay. But, they were not ready for the problems that would come after. The country was in chaos. 

The US government thought it could easily put in a new government and make it work. But, it was not easy. It is not easy to make a new government in any country. The US government should have learned from its mistakes in Vietnam.

The US government said it was going to Iraq to help the people and make a democratic government. But, that was not the only reason. The US wanted Iraq's oil. The government said that Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but they did not.

Now, many American soldiers are still in Iraq. They are trying to help the Iraqi people, but it is a long and hard process. The US government should have thought about this before going to war.

This is a difficult decision. Once the US went to war, it was hard to leave. The US took control of Iraq and its government. The US should not just leave now. But, the US is losing many soldiers. How many is too many? 

We should think about why the US went to war. The US is not helping all the countries that need help. There is a reason why the US went to war in Iraq and not in other countries. It is about oil and money.

I hope the war in Iraq ends soon and there is peace. But, it may not be easy.

I am for gay marriage. I have always been for it. I think it is a personal preference. People have shown that it may be biological and not caused by how a person is raised. This means people should not be treated unfairly because of something they cannot control. I think it is not fair to deny them rights.

I do not think the government should get involved in this. This is a personal issue, not a matter for the government. In my neighborhood, there are two or three openly gay couples who are not married. But they live like any other family. They walk their dogs like anyone else.

I think President Bush is trying to decide what marriage means. I think this is wrong. It is not his job to decide. 

I have read and heard that research shows a person's sexual orientation may be caused by a chemical in the brain. This means some people may be born gay. It is not because of how they were raised.

I think marriage is a personal thing. If a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it without telling anyone. But if two men or two women want to get married, it is a big deal. This should be a private matter, not something for everyone to know.

I do not think the government should decide who can get married and who cannot. This is a personal choice. It should not be a national issue.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. You cannot control who sees it. It is like putting something in a store window. Everyone can see it. If you say something bad or something that can cause harm, people will notice. A friend can see it and tell others. You cannot stop them from seeing it. If you are friends with someone on the internet, they can see what you write.

The internet is a public place. Schools and others can see what you write. They must act if they see something bad. They cannot ignore it. If something bad happens, they could have stopped it. When something bad happened at our school, someone overheard something being said. They called the school and told them. We found out who said it and looked at their internet things. They had written something that could be taken seriously.

When you put something on the internet, you have no privacy. If you don't want people to see it, don't put it there. If you don't want someone to think something about you, don't write it. You cannot tell others not to take something seriously. It is like a public message. School officials should not be friends with students on the internet. They should not look at students' internet things unless they are told about something bad. If they are told about something bad, they must act.

Teachers should not make a fake internet account to be friends with students. That is not right. I do not want to know about my residents' personal lives. I do not want to see their pictures or know what they are doing. It is not my place to know.

I have concerns about the war. It has gone on for too long. The original goal was good. We wanted to help another country have a fair government. But now, I think we have lost sight of that goal. We are fighting just to show we are strong.

Perhaps the reasons for the war were questionable from the start. We have seen examples of this in the past, like what happened with Iraq and Saddam Hussein. If our goal was to help another country, that is a good reason to go to war. But if there were personal reasons, that would not be fair.

I think we made our point in the first few months of the war. It was a strong statement. But the war has gone on for many years. This is too long. I think we should stop fighting.

If our goal was to help a country ruled by a cruel leader, that would be a good reason for war. But I do not think that is our goal anymore. It seems like we are fighting just to fight. We do not want to lose the war.

I think the war has gone on long enough. The country we are fighting will have to take care of itself soon. We have our own problems to solve, like poverty and poor education. We should be spending money on those things, not on a long war.

We are spending billions of dollars on this war. War should not be a long-term expense. We have many problems to fix at home, like roads and schools. We should be spending money on those things, not on a war that has lost its purpose.

Money that is being spent on the war could be used to help our own people. We have many citizens who are struggling. It is not fair that we are spending their tax money on a war in a foreign country.

You want to ask a question to clarify something. You wanted to know if it was okay that someone found information about you on the internet. This person found it on a website called Myspace. Myspace is a place where people can share information about themselves. Anyone can see the information if they are friends with you on the site. That means you gave permission for them to see your information.

When you put information on the internet, many people can see it. It is like showing your information to a lot of people. You should be careful about what you share online. You don't know who might see it.

You think it was good that someone found the information and it helped prevent something bad from happening. But you also think it's not fair to have someone looking at everyone's information all the time. It's not fair to judge people based on what they share online.

You have a social media account called Facebook. You are careful about what you share, but you also want to be able to communicate with your friends. It's hard to know who can see your information on the internet.

You know of someone who went to a school where students were not allowed to have Myspace accounts. You don't think the school had the right to tell students what they can and cannot do online.

I am thinking about the Iraq War. This is a difficult subject. Many people think it was a bad idea. Some of them were against it from the beginning. I am also against it. I was against it from the beginning.

Most people do not agree with the decision to go to war. Seventy-five percent of people in the United States, Iraq, and the world think it was not a good idea. Even many soldiers who are in Iraq now think it was a bad decision. They want to leave soon.

The war has been very difficult. Many people think it was a disaster from the start. We should not have gone there. Now, leaving is also a problem. There is no easy way to fix the situation.

The United States and Middle Eastern countries have different cultures. It is hard for us to understand each other. We thought we could bring democracy to Iraq, but it is not the way they want to live.

Saddam Hussein was a bad leader. However, we should not have invaded the country. We should have thought about the consequences before we went in.

I do not see a reason to stay in Iraq. The administration may have some reasons, but I do not agree with them. If they want to leave gradually, that is okay. But I do not see why we cannot leave now.

Many Iraqis want us to leave. At least eighty percent of them think we should be gone within a year. If we ask them what to do, they say leave. This makes sense. If things go badly, we can say we were following their decision.

If we leave, we will be seen as trying to help. It is not a perfect solution, but it is better than where we are now.

I think there is still a problem with fairness between men and women in the United States. This problem is not just for women, but also for people in certain jobs. Women often have a harder time advancing in their work because of a problem called the "glass ceiling." This means that people may not choose women for higher positions, even if they are qualified. This is because women are not usually in charge in business.

Men also have problems in certain jobs, like working at home with their children. Some people think it is not good for a man to stay home and take care of the children. They think men should work and earn money for their family. But this can be hard for men who want to be with their children and help raise them.

In the fashion industry, men are not always taken seriously if they like fashion. People may think that men who like fashion are not like other men. They may not understand what men in the fashion industry are doing.

But I think things are getting better. More women are becoming successful in business and are being accepted as leaders. And more men are staying home to take care of their children. This is good because it shows that people are changing their minds.

To make things fairer, we need to show that everyone has good qualities, not just the ones that people expect. If we do not push too hard, people will not resist the change. We should just show the good qualities of people who are different.

We have made a lot of progress, and change takes time. I think we are at a good point where people are starting to accept differences.

People can also be discriminated against because of where they are from or how they talk. For example, if someone has poor grammar but is very smart, people may not believe what they say. This can happen to men and women.

I think I understand the situation. They made marijuana use not a crime. This means that people who use it will not go to jail. Instead, they will get a ticket, like a traffic ticket. This can be a problem for people who want a job or other opportunities. It can affect their lives in many ways.

Some people think that making marijuana use not a crime saves money. It costs a lot to arrest people, take them to court, and pay for lawyers and judges. When towns have little money, they may not want to do this.

However, in some places, like Denver, people are open-minded about marijuana. They think it is okay to use it. This town has more money now to spend on good things, like education and help for the elderly and homeless people.

But there are reasons why marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not good to have people smoking it and driving. And in many places, people do not like it. They think it is not right to use it openly.

Alcohol can hurt people's driving skills. Marijuana can hurt people's lives in other ways, like how they act and think. But people are different, and they react to things in different ways.

So, it is hard to say how marijuana affects people. But it can be bad for some people. We should be careful about how we use it.

Their customs are good, but it is also important to change.

Sometimes I feel that the Catholic Church does not accept people who do not follow the rules. 
They also do not accept people from other religions.

My mother was Catholic and my father was Episcopalian. 
The Catholic Church would not marry them. 
This is not being kind to others. 
Catholics learn to love others. 
But it is not kind to not accept others.

This is a difficult issue. I do not have an opinion on this matter yet. I do not know if either side is right or wrong. This is a confusing problem. It is hard to solve without hurting someone's feelings.

The issue is between government and church. Marriage is a big problem to define. This is because marriage is a special event for some people. They consider it a sacrament. If we look at marriage in this way, people might not get special tax breaks or government help if they are not baptized.

If two people are married, I think the government should just see it as a civil union. This is because marriage is two people together. The government should not ask about the kind of marriage it is.

Some people think marriage should be between a man and a woman. Others think it should be between two people who love each other. This is a hard problem to solve.

If all states can agree on what to do, then they should make it a national law. But changing the US Constitution to ban gay marriage is not a good idea. The Constitution should not be changed for a small group of people.

This issue is not big enough to change the Constitution. It is not important enough to make a law that says who can get married and who cannot.

I grew up in a Christian home. I respect people with different beliefs. Homosexuality is a complicated issue for me. I have many gay friends. I don't agree with all of their choices, but I believe they should be free to live as they wish. I don't think it's the government's job to decide. Each state should decide its own laws.

My friends and I talk about this. Some states are democratic and some are republican. Democratic states are more likely to support gay marriage. If you live in a state that allows gay marriage, you should respect its decision.

I think gay people should have the same rights as everyone else. Each state should decide whether to allow gay marriage. I don't think the president should make a decision for the whole country.

President Bush does not live in every state. He should not decide how each state is run. Each state should be allowed to make its own decisions.

Some things should be up to each individual state. The president's decision is temporary and can be changed by the next president. States will have to live with their own decisions, not the president.

I don't think so.

I don’t agree with this idea. Posting on Myspace is a public thing. You post something for everyone to see. If you do that on the internet, people will see it, even school officials. They can see it from their homes.

School officials should be able to see what students post online. This can help keep students safe. For example, if they find students posting about drinking or smoking, they can stop them. This is a school’s job: to keep students safe.

But I don’t think it’s right for school officials to go on the internet just to catch students. If they want to do that, it’s an invasion of privacy. However, if it makes the school safer, that’s okay.

I think it’s a good idea for school officials to go online to make sure students are safe. They can check Myspace to stop students from doing bad things. This is like the school’s drill practice for when there might be a problem.

School officials want to keep students safe, like after the Columbine incident. They do this to prevent something bad from happening. I think this is a good thing.

I don't agree with the war in the Middle East. I was personally affected by 9/11. But now I think we should not be there. We did not think about the long-term effects of the war. We went to the war quickly without a good plan. This made things worse for us.

We should not be in the Middle East. The people there are fighting each other. They cannot fight with us if they cannot agree with themselves. We cannot help them by being there. We went to the war without being prepared. We did not know what we would face.

War is different in the Middle East. They fight in a way that is not like our way. They do not want to make their country better. They just want us to leave. We should leave and let them handle their own problems.

We were not thinking clearly before we went to war. We were angry and wanted revenge. We did not think about what could happen. We just wanted to fight. President Bush wanted to declare war on Iraq because many people wanted to. But we should have had a better plan.

We did not know what we were doing. We did not have unity. We did not know what we wanted to achieve. This made things worse. I think we should not be in the Middle East. We are not making progress. We are hurting ourselves by being there. We cannot stay there forever. When we leave, things will fall apart.

transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs to make some changes. Many people have been saying this because the Church does not accept some things. Like gay marriages and abortion. The Church has strong views on these topics, but they are old-fashioned in some ways.

If the Church changed its ideas a little, it would not lose followers. People are turning away from the Church because of its views on these issues. Some people do not agree with the Church on things like this.

For example, the Church is against abortion. If you support abortion, you will not be comfortable in a Church where it is considered wrong. The same is true for gay marriage. If you believe in it, you might not want to be in a Church that does not agree.

The Church does not allow women to be priests or priests to be married. This might not have stopped problems in the Church, but it could have helped. Maybe priests would have acted differently if they were allowed to be married or have a family.

The Church says its priests are married to God and devote their lives to the Church. But other people can have a job and a family life. There is no reason priests cannot have both.

I am not opposed to gay marriage. I think it is not wrong for two people of the same sex to get married. People are born gay. It is not a choice. They should not be held responsible for their sexual orientation. It is not right to say that a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex cannot.

I think it is not a choice. People are born straight or gay. It is not something they can change. I was born straight and I know people are born gay. They should not be blamed for their sexual orientation.

I do not think the federal government should be involved in this issue. It is not a matter of law. It is not a moral issue either. People should be free to be who they are. They should not be judged or punished for being gay.

The federal government should not interfere with people's personal lives. They should let people make their own choices. Being gay is not a bad thing. It is just a part of who they are.

In my opinion, the federal government has no right to tell people what to do. They should not try to control people's lives. Gays are people too. They deserve respect and freedom.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. 

There is no good reason not to. 

Some people think that gay couples could be bad for families. But this is not true. Every couple is different. 

Gay couples are like heterosexual couples. They have the same kinds of problems and the same kinds of love. 

Gay couples want a marriage certificate from the government, not a marriage in a church. This should not be a problem. 

It is like segregation. Separate and unequal is not fair. 

People are worried about adoption and how children will be treated. But this is not a reason to keep gay couples from marrying. 

Gay parents love their children just like straight parents do. They make the same decisions and have the same feelings. 

We should not judge people based on their choices. We should let them be who they are. 

The government should make sure gay marriage is allowed everywhere. The law should be fair for everyone. 

President Bush has his own opinions on this issue. He thinks it is against his religion. But the government should not make laws based on one person's opinions. 

We should consider what is fair and what is right. The government should not just follow what some people believe. 

Some people think gay people are damaged or have a personality problem. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so. We should listen to experts, not just what people think. 

We should treat everyone equally and with respect. This is what we want for our country.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. You may wonder why I think marijuana should be legal. The reason is simple – a drug being illegal does not mean it has no good effects. While I do not think it should be available to the public, I believe it can be useful for medical purposes.

Many medicines used in pharmacies are illegal, but they are still used because they are helpful. For example, oxycodone and Vicodin are controlled substances, but they are used because they are beneficial. Marijuana may have beneficial effects, but it is not available because of a negative image. I think we should look at the good things marijuana can do and understand it better.

Marijuana and alcohol are not the same. While abusing marijuana can be bad, abusing alcohol can also cause problems. But we can use marijuana responsibly. To do this, we need to change the way people think about marijuana. If we make it legal, people may use it wisely.

The problem is that many people think marijuana is bad because it is illegal. But it is not as bad as heroine or cocaine. If we can change this image, people may use marijuana responsibly for medical reasons.

I think the church has changed in recent years to become more like the 21st century. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was young, I went to church on Sundays. I would wear nice dresses, matching shoes, and a matching purse. I attended a private school and saw my friends there on weekends. We would attend the early mass. But now, the church has a special service for teenagers, called a teenager mass. The service is only 30 minutes long. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. Some wear beach clothes right from the beach. Families sometimes arrive late. The church has become more casual, even for morning masses. I used to wear nice clothes, but now people wear jeans and khakis. This is the main thing I have noticed about the church.

As for other things, that is all I know about the church. I do not know about the politics inside the church. I am not sure about the church's rules and decisions.

I do not think the church's rules about marriage and being a priest would have stopped the problems with pedophilia. There are men who are married but still have these problems. It is not because they are allowed to get married or not that causes the problem, but because of the person themselves. Becoming a priest is a choice, and there are other religions where priests can get married.

I think the problem of pedophilia is based on genetics. People are born with these tendencies, and it is not something they become because of how they are raised. Genetics play a role, and you cannot hide this through marriage. It may come out eventually. The church may not be able to prevent this from happening.

If the church knew about the problems and tried to cover them up, that would be wrong. But I do not think they knew in all cases. I do not have any other thoughts about the Catholic church.

I was unhappy with the reasons for the United States going to war in Iraq. 

The US went to war in Iraq after the September 11 attacks. However, I do not think that was the real reason for the war. The US government said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction, but this was not true. 

I think the Bush administration lied to the American people. Even Colin Powell, the former Secretary of State, said he was not sure about the evidence. 

The US government does not respect the Constitution. They are trying to ignore its rules. Since the September 11 attacks, the government has been doing this. 

The Bush administration wanted to go to war in Iraq before they took office. 

I think the US government has no respect for human life. They caused a lot of suffering in Iraq. 

The country is unstable. Iraqis are fighting among themselves. The government is not working well. The Prime Minister has no control over the country. Radical groups are fighting for power. I am worried about the future of Iraq.

I have some thoughts about the war in Iraq. It is not a declared war. It began after the attacks on the United States on nine eleven. I do not like to follow the details of the war. It seems like we are in Iraq to help build a democracy. But it is also about getting oil from the country.

Staying in Iraq makes people upset. If we leave, they will be angry with us. We will have to help them rebuild their country. But if we stay, it will take a long time to build a democracy. It is not fair to the people of Iraq.

I do not know what to say. This is a difficult topic. I think the war should end, but I also think about the families of soldiers who are fighting in Iraq. They have lives, just like us. We have hurt their country and their people.

It is hard to decide what to do. If we stay, we will try to change their way of life. But their culture is different from ours. It may make things worse for them. Their feelings of hate towards the United States may grow.

I think this war will last a long time. It will be a big problem for years to come.

I don't agree with this idea. It's not right for the government to make something legal or illegal. The constitution says the government and the church should be separate. This is clear in the constitution. It's a basic rule. The government should not try to enforce its power over it.

Trying to make laws against it is wrong. It would be against the constitution. The constitution says the government should not choose which churches are good or bad. Most Catholics and Christians do not agree with it. But this should not be a decision for the government to make.

Separation of church and state is a key part of the United States. It allows for freedom of religion. The government should not make laws about what churches can or cannot do. Even if there was a new law, it would be wrong. It would go against what is already written.

The government should not be involved in this issue. I don't see why the president is pushing for this law. It's because of his own personal feelings. He wants to show that one church is better than others. This is not fair.

It's up to the churches to decide what is right or wrong. The president and the government should not make this decision. There is no good reason for this law. It's just because of personal views.

This law might not be good for the economy. It could even help the economy. I'm not sure. But I think it could make society better.

I think I said everything I wanted to say.

The war in Iraq was a big problem. The American government did not tell the truth to the American people about why they wanted to go to war. They said that the war was connected to the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001. But, really, it was not. 

Going to war in Iraq was a mistake. I do not think war is usually a good idea. The government made it seem like the war would be short and successful. But, it was not. Many American soldiers died. 

This war was like the Vietnam War. The American government made the same mistake twice. They took out the Iraqi government and thought everything would be okay. But, they were not ready for the problems that would come after. The country was in chaos. 

The US government thought it could easily put in a new government and make it work. But, it was not easy. It is not easy to make a new government in any country. The US government should have learned from its mistakes in Vietnam.

The US government said it was going to Iraq to help the people and make a democratic government. But, that was not the only reason. The US wanted Iraq's oil. The government said that Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but they did not.

Now, many American soldiers are still in Iraq. They are trying to help the Iraqi people, but it is a long and hard process. The US government should have thought about this before going to war.

This is a difficult decision. Once the US went to war, it was hard to leave. The US took control of Iraq and its government. The US should not just leave now. But, the US is losing many soldiers. How many is too many? 

We should think about why the US went to war. The US is not helping all the countries that need help. There is a reason why the US went to war in Iraq and not in other countries. It is about oil and money.

I hope the war in Iraq ends soon and there is peace. But, it may not be easy.

I am for gay marriage. I have always been for it. I think it is a personal preference. People have shown that it may be biological and not caused by how a person is raised. This means people should not be treated unfairly because of something they cannot control. I think it is not fair to deny them rights.

I do not think the government should get involved in this. This is a personal issue, not a matter for the government. In my neighborhood, there are two or three openly gay couples who are not married. But they live like any other family. They walk their dogs like anyone else.

I think President Bush is trying to decide what marriage means. I think this is wrong. It is not his job to decide. 

I have read and heard that research shows a person's sexual orientation may be caused by a chemical in the brain. This means some people may be born gay. It is not because of how they were raised.

I think marriage is a personal thing. If a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it without telling anyone. But if two men or two women want to get married, it is a big deal. This should be a private matter, not something for everyone to know.

I do not think the government should decide who can get married and who cannot. This is a personal choice. It should not be a national issue.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. You cannot control who sees it. It is like putting something in a store window. Everyone can see it. If you say something bad or something that can cause harm, people will notice. A friend can see it and tell others. You cannot stop them from seeing it. If you are friends with someone on the internet, they can see what you write.

The internet is a public place. Schools and others can see what you write. They must act if they see something bad. They cannot ignore it. If something bad happens, they could have stopped it. When something bad happened at our school, someone overheard something being said. They called the school and told them. We found out who said it and looked at their internet things. They had written something that could be taken seriously.

When you put something on the internet, you have no privacy. If you don't want people to see it, don't put it there. If you don't want someone to think something about you, don't write it. You cannot tell others not to take something seriously. It is like a public message. School officials should not be friends with students on the internet. They should not look at students' internet things unless they are told about something bad. If they are told about something bad, they must act.

Teachers should not make a fake internet account to be friends with students. That is not right. I do not want to know about my residents' personal lives. I do not want to see their pictures or know what they are doing. It is not my place to know.

I have concerns about the war. It has gone on for too long. The original goal was good. We wanted to help another country have a fair government. But now, I think we have lost sight of that goal. We are fighting just to show we are strong.

Perhaps the reasons for the war were questionable from the start. We have seen examples of this in the past, like what happened with Iraq and Saddam Hussein. If our goal was to help another country, that is a good reason to go to war. But if there were personal reasons, that would not be fair.

I think we made our point in the first few months of the war. It was a strong statement. But the war has gone on for many years. This is too long. I think we should stop fighting.

If our goal was to help a country ruled by a cruel leader, that would be a good reason for war. But I do not think that is our goal anymore. It seems like we are fighting just to fight. We do not want to lose the war.

I think the war has gone on long enough. The country we are fighting will have to take care of itself soon. We have our own problems to solve, like poverty and poor education. We should be spending money on those things, not on a long war.

We are spending billions of dollars on this war. War should not be a long-term expense. We have many problems to fix at home, like roads and schools. We should be spending money on those things, not on a war that has lost its purpose.

Money that is being spent on the war could be used to help our own people. We have many citizens who are struggling. It is not fair that we are spending their tax money on a war in a foreign country.

You want to ask a question to clarify something. You wanted to know if it was okay that someone found information about you on the internet. This person found it on a website called Myspace. Myspace is a place where people can share information about themselves. Anyone can see the information if they are friends with you on the site. That means you gave permission for them to see your information.

When you put information on the internet, many people can see it. It is like showing your information to a lot of people. You should be careful about what you share online. You don't know who might see it.

You think it was good that someone found the information and it helped prevent something bad from happening. But you also think it's not fair to have someone looking at everyone's information all the time. It's not fair to judge people based on what they share online.

You have a social media account called Facebook. You are careful about what you share, but you also want to be able to communicate with your friends. It's hard to know who can see your information on the internet.

You know of someone who went to a school where students were not allowed to have Myspace accounts. You don't think the school had the right to tell students what they can and cannot do online.

I am thinking about the Iraq War. This is a difficult subject. Many people think it was a bad idea. Some of them were against it from the beginning. I am also against it. I was against it from the beginning.

Most people do not agree with the decision to go to war. Seventy-five percent of people in the United States, Iraq, and the world think it was not a good idea. Even many soldiers who are in Iraq now think it was a bad decision. They want to leave soon.

The war has been very difficult. Many people think it was a disaster from the start. We should not have gone there. Now, leaving is also a problem. There is no easy way to fix the situation.

The United States and Middle Eastern countries have different cultures. It is hard for us to understand each other. We thought we could bring democracy to Iraq, but it is not the way they want to live.

Saddam Hussein was a bad leader. However, we should not have invaded the country. We should have thought about the consequences before we went in.

I do not see a reason to stay in Iraq. The administration may have some reasons, but I do not agree with them. If they want to leave gradually, that is okay. But I do not see why we cannot leave now.

Many Iraqis want us to leave. At least eighty percent of them think we should be gone within a year. If we ask them what to do, they say leave. This makes sense. If things go badly, we can say we were following their decision.

If we leave, we will be seen as trying to help. It is not a perfect solution, but it is better than where we are now.

I think there is still a problem with fairness between men and women in the United States. This problem is not just for women, but also for people in certain jobs. Women often have a harder time advancing in their work because of a problem called the "glass ceiling." This means that people may not choose women for higher positions, even if they are qualified. This is because women are not usually in charge in business.

Men also have problems in certain jobs, like working at home with their children. Some people think it is not good for a man to stay home and take care of the children. They think men should work and earn money for their family. But this can be hard for men who want to be with their children and help raise them.

In the fashion industry, men are not always taken seriously if they like fashion. People may think that men who like fashion are not like other men. They may not understand what men in the fashion industry are doing.

But I think things are getting better. More women are becoming successful in business and are being accepted as leaders. And more men are staying home to take care of their children. This is good because it shows that people are changing their minds.

To make things fairer, we need to show that everyone has good qualities, not just the ones that people expect. If we do not push too hard, people will not resist the change. We should just show the good qualities of people who are different.

We have made a lot of progress, and change takes time. I think we are at a good point where people are starting to accept differences.

People can also be discriminated against because of where they are from or how they talk. For example, if someone has poor grammar but is very smart, people may not believe what they say. This can happen to men and women.

I think I understand the situation. They made marijuana use not a crime. This means that people who use it will not go to jail. Instead, they will get a ticket, like a traffic ticket. This can be a problem for people who want a job or other opportunities. It can affect their lives in many ways.

Some people think that making marijuana use not a crime saves money. It costs a lot to arrest people, take them to court, and pay for lawyers and judges. When towns have little money, they may not want to do this.

However, in some places, like Denver, people are open-minded about marijuana. They think it is okay to use it. This town has more money now to spend on good things, like education and help for the elderly and homeless people.

But there are reasons why marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not good to have people smoking it and driving. And in many places, people do not like it. They think it is not right to use it openly.

Alcohol can hurt people's driving skills. Marijuana can hurt people's lives in other ways, like how they act and think. But people are different, and they react to things in different ways.

So, it is hard to say how marijuana affects people. But it can be bad for some people. We should be careful about how we use it.

This is a difficult issue. I do not have an opinion on this matter yet. I do not know if either side is right or wrong. This is a confusing problem. It is hard to solve without hurting someone's feelings.

The issue is between government and church. Marriage is a big problem to define. This is because marriage is a special event for some people. They consider it a sacrament. If we look at marriage in this way, people might not get special tax breaks or government help if they are not baptized.

If two people are married, I think the government should just see it as a civil union. This is because marriage is two people together. The government should not ask about the kind of marriage it is.

Some people think marriage should be between a man and a woman. Others think it should be between two people who love each other. This is a hard problem to solve.

If all states can agree on what to do, then they should make it a national law. But changing the US Constitution to ban gay marriage is not a good idea. The Constitution should not be changed for a small group of people.

This issue is not big enough to change the Constitution. It is not important enough to make a law that says who can get married and who cannot.

I grew up in a Christian home. I respect people with different beliefs. Homosexuality is a complicated issue for me. I have many gay friends. I don't agree with all of their choices, but I believe they should be free to live as they wish. I don't think it's the government's job to decide. Each state should decide its own laws.

My friends and I talk about this. Some states are democratic and some are republican. Democratic states are more likely to support gay marriage. If you live in a state that allows gay marriage, you should respect its decision.

I think gay people should have the same rights as everyone else. Each state should decide whether to allow gay marriage. I don't think the president should make a decision for the whole country.

President Bush does not live in every state. He should not decide how each state is run. Each state should be allowed to make its own decisions.

Some things should be up to each individual state. The president's decision is temporary and can be changed by the next president. States will have to live with their own decisions, not the president.

I don’t agree with this idea. Posting on Myspace is a public thing. You post something for everyone to see. If you do that on the internet, people will see it, even school officials. They can see it from their homes.

School officials should be able to see what students post online. This can help keep students safe. For example, if they find students posting about drinking or smoking, they can stop them. This is a school’s job: to keep students safe.

But I don’t think it’s right for school officials to go on the internet just to catch students. If they want to do that, it’s an invasion of privacy. However, if it makes the school safer, that’s okay.

I think it’s a good idea for school officials to go online to make sure students are safe. They can check Myspace to stop students from doing bad things. This is like the school’s drill practice for when there might be a problem.

School officials want to keep students safe, like after the Columbine incident. They do this to prevent something bad from happening. I think this is a good thing.

I don't agree with the war in the Middle East. I was personally affected by 9/11. But now I think we should not be there. We did not think about the long-term effects of the war. We went to the war quickly without a good plan. This made things worse for us.

We should not be in the Middle East. The people there are fighting each other. They cannot fight with us if they cannot agree with themselves. We cannot help them by being there. We went to the war without being prepared. We did not know what we would face.

War is different in the Middle East. They fight in a way that is not like our way. They do not want to make their country better. They just want us to leave. We should leave and let them handle their own problems.

We were not thinking clearly before we went to war. We were angry and wanted revenge. We did not think about what could happen. We just wanted to fight. President Bush wanted to declare war on Iraq because many people wanted to. But we should have had a better plan.

We did not know what we were doing. We did not have unity. We did not know what we wanted to achieve. This made things worse. I think we should not be in the Middle East. We are not making progress. We are hurting ourselves by being there. We cannot stay there forever. When we leave, things will fall apart.

The Catholic Church needs to make some changes. Many people have been saying this because the Church does not accept some things. Like gay marriages and abortion. The Church has strong views on these topics, but they are old-fashioned in some ways.

If the Church changed its ideas a little, it would not lose followers. People are turning away from the Church because of its views on these issues. Some people do not agree with the Church on things like this.

For example, the Church is against abortion. If you support abortion, you will not be comfortable in a Church where it is considered wrong. The same is true for gay marriage. If you believe in it, you might not want to be in a Church that does not agree.

The Church does not allow women to be priests or priests to be married. This might not have stopped problems in the Church, but it could have helped. Maybe priests would have acted differently if they were allowed to be married or have a family.

The Church says its priests are married to God and devote their lives to the Church. But other people can have a job and a family life. There is no reason priests cannot have both.

I am not opposed to gay marriage. I think it is not wrong for two people of the same sex to get married. People are born gay. It is not a choice. They should not be held responsible for their sexual orientation. It is not right to say that a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex cannot.

I think it is not a choice. People are born straight or gay. It is not something they can change. I was born straight and I know people are born gay. They should not be blamed for their sexual orientation.

I do not think the federal government should be involved in this issue. It is not a matter of law. It is not a moral issue either. People should be free to be who they are. They should not be judged or punished for being gay.

The federal government should not interfere with people's personal lives. They should let people make their own choices. Being gay is not a bad thing. It is just a part of who they are.

In my opinion, the federal government has no right to tell people what to do. They should not try to control people's lives. Gays are people too. They deserve respect and freedom.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. 

There is no good reason not to. 

Some people think that gay couples could be bad for families. But this is not true. Every couple is different. 

Gay couples are like heterosexual couples. They have the same kinds of problems and the same kinds of love. 

Gay couples want a marriage certificate from the government, not a marriage in a church. This should not be a problem. 

It is like segregation. Separate and unequal is not fair. 

People are worried about adoption and how children will be treated. But this is not a reason to keep gay couples from marrying. 

Gay parents love their children just like straight parents do. They make the same decisions and have the same feelings. 

We should not judge people based on their choices. We should let them be who they are. 

The government should make sure gay marriage is allowed everywhere. The law should be fair for everyone. 

President Bush has his own opinions on this issue. He thinks it is against his religion. But the government should not make laws based on one person's opinions. 

We should consider what is fair and what is right. The government should not just follow what some people believe. 

Some people think gay people are damaged or have a personality problem. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so. We should listen to experts, not just what people think. 

We should treat everyone equally and with respect. This is what we want for our country.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. You may wonder why I think marijuana should be legal. The reason is simple – a drug being illegal does not mean it has no good effects. While I do not think it should be available to the public, I believe it can be useful for medical purposes.

Many medicines used in pharmacies are illegal, but they are still used because they are helpful. For example, oxycodone and Vicodin are controlled substances, but they are used because they are beneficial. Marijuana may have beneficial effects, but it is not available because of a negative image. I think we should look at the good things marijuana can do and understand it better.

Marijuana and alcohol are not the same. While abusing marijuana can be bad, abusing alcohol can also cause problems. But we can use marijuana responsibly. To do this, we need to change the way people think about marijuana. If we make it legal, people may use it wisely.

The problem is that many people think marijuana is bad because it is illegal. But it is not as bad as heroine or cocaine. If we can change this image, people may use marijuana responsibly for medical reasons.

I think the church has changed in recent years to become more like the 21st century. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was young, I went to church on Sundays. I would wear nice dresses, matching shoes, and a matching purse. I attended a private school and saw my friends there on weekends. We would attend the early mass. But now, the church has a special service for teenagers, called a teenager mass. The service is only 30 minutes long. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. Some wear beach clothes right from the beach. Families sometimes arrive late. The church has become more casual, even for morning masses. I used to wear nice clothes, but now people wear jeans and khakis. This is the main thing I have noticed about the church.

As for other things, that is all I know about the church. I do not know about the politics inside the church. I am not sure about the church's rules and decisions.

I do not think the church's rules about marriage and being a priest would have stopped the problems with pedophilia. There are men who are married but still have these problems. It is not because they are allowed to get married or not that causes the problem, but because of the person themselves. Becoming a priest is a choice, and there are other religions where priests can get married.

I think the problem of pedophilia is based on genetics. People are born with these tendencies, and it is not something they become because of how they are raised. Genetics play a role, and you cannot hide this through marriage. It may come out eventually. The church may not be able to prevent this from happening.

If the church knew about the problems and tried to cover them up, that would be wrong. But I do not think they knew in all cases. I do not have any other thoughts about the Catholic church.

I was unhappy with the reasons for the United States going to war in Iraq. 

The US went to war in Iraq after the September 11 attacks. However, I do not think that was the real reason for the war. The US government said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction, but this was not true. 

I think the Bush administration lied to the American people. Even Colin Powell, the former Secretary of State, said he was not sure about the evidence. 

The US government does not respect the Constitution. They are trying to ignore its rules. Since the September 11 attacks, the government has been doing this. 

The Bush administration wanted to go to war in Iraq before they took office. 

I think the US government has no respect for human life. They caused a lot of suffering in Iraq. 

The country is unstable. Iraqis are fighting among themselves. The government is not working well. The Prime Minister has no control over the country. Radical groups are fighting for power. I am worried about the future of Iraq.

I have some thoughts about the war in Iraq. It is not a declared war. It began after the attacks on the United States on nine eleven. I do not like to follow the details of the war. It seems like we are in Iraq to help build a democracy. But it is also about getting oil from the country.

Staying in Iraq makes people upset. If we leave, they will be angry with us. We will have to help them rebuild their country. But if we stay, it will take a long time to build a democracy. It is not fair to the people of Iraq.

I do not know what to say. This is a difficult topic. I think the war should end, but I also think about the families of soldiers who are fighting in Iraq. They have lives, just like us. We have hurt their country and their people.

It is hard to decide what to do. If we stay, we will try to change their way of life. But their culture is different from ours. It may make things worse for them. Their feelings of hate towards the United States may grow.

I think this war will last a long time. It will be a big problem for years to come.

I don't agree with this idea. It's not right for the government to make something legal or illegal. The constitution says the government and the church should be separate. This is clear in the constitution. It's a basic rule. The government should not try to enforce its power over it.

Trying to make laws against it is wrong. It would be against the constitution. The constitution says the government should not choose which churches are good or bad. Most Catholics and Christians do not agree with it. But this should not be a decision for the government to make.

It's up to the churches to decide what is right or wrong. The president and the government should not make this decision. There is no good reason for this law. It's just because of personal views.

The war in Iraq was a big problem. The American government did not tell the truth to the American people about why they wanted to go to war. They said that the war was connected to the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001. But, really, it was not. 

Going to war in Iraq was a mistake. I do not think war is usually a good idea. The government made it seem like the war would be short and successful. But, it was not. Many American soldiers died. 

This war was like the Vietnam War. The American government made the same mistake twice. They took out the Iraqi government and thought everything would be okay. But, they were not ready for the problems that would come after. The country was in chaos. 

The US government thought it could easily put in a new government and make it work. But, it was not easy. It is not easy to make a new government in any country. The US government should have learned from its mistakes in Vietnam.

The US government said it was going to Iraq to help the people and make a democratic government. But, that was not the only reason. The US wanted Iraq's oil. The government said that Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but they did not.

Now, many American soldiers are still in Iraq. They are trying to help the Iraqi people, but it is a long and hard process. The US government should have thought about this before going to war.

This is a difficult decision. Once the US went to war, it was hard to leave. The US took control of Iraq and its government. The US should not just leave now. But, the US is losing many soldiers. How many is too many? 

We should think about why the US went to war. The US is not helping all the countries that need help. There is a reason why the US went to war in Iraq and not in other countries. It is about oil and money.

I hope the war in Iraq ends soon and there is peace. But, it may not be easy.

I do not think the government should decide who can get married and who cannot. This is a personal choice. It should not be a national issue.

I have concerns about the war. It has gone on for too long. The original goal was good. We wanted to help another country have a fair government. But now, I think we have lost sight of that goal. We are fighting just to show we are strong.

Perhaps the reasons for the war were questionable from the start. We have seen examples of this in the past, like what happened with Iraq and Saddam Hussein. If our goal was to help another country, that is a good reason to go to war. But if there were personal reasons, that would not be fair.

I think we made our point in the first few months of the war. It was a strong statement. But the war has gone on for many years. This is too long. I think we should stop fighting.

If our goal was to help a country ruled by a cruel leader, that would be a good reason for war. But I do not think that is our goal anymore. It seems like we are fighting just to fight. We do not want to lose the war.

I think the war has gone on long enough. The country we are fighting will have to take care of itself soon. We have our own problems to solve, like poverty and poor education. We should be spending money on those things, not on a long war.

We are spending billions of dollars on this war. War should not be a long-term expense. We have many problems to fix at home, like roads and schools. We should be spending money on those things, not on a war that has lost its purpose.

Money that is being spent on the war could be used to help our own people. We have many citizens who are struggling. It is not fair that we are spending their tax money on a war in a foreign country.

Most people do not agree with the decision to go to war. Seventy-five percent of people in the United States, Iraq, and the world think it was not a good idea. Even many soldiers who are in Iraq now think it was a bad decision. They want to leave soon.

The United States and Middle Eastern countries have different cultures. It is hard for us to understand each other. We thought we could bring democracy to Iraq, but it is not the way they want to live.

But I think things are getting better. More women are becoming successful in business and are being accepted as leaders. And more men are staying home to take care of their children. This is good because it shows that people are changing their minds.
